# Anasova

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | [anasova.com](https://www.anasova.com/) |
| **Category** | Lead Generation / Sales Intelligence Platform / Prospecting Tools |
| **Description** | Anasova is a lead generation platform and sales intelligence tool for financial services companies. The company provides a marketplace for Marketing Qualified Leads (MQLs) and Sales Qualified Leads (SQLs) through AI-powered financial planning questionnaires and targeted prospect matching. Anasova owns FreeFinancialPlan.com and AIFinancialPlanning.com, where consumers search for financial planning advice and connect with advisors who meet their criteria. |

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Name | Cost | Key Features |
|------|------|------|--------------|
| **Starter** | MQL Marketplace | **$7-$70 per lead** | Marketing Qualified Leads (email only), competitive bidding, basic filtering |
| **Standard** | SQL Marketplace | **$200-$2,000 per lead** | Sales Qualified Leads (phone + email), exclusive leads, advanced targeting |
| **Enterprise** | Custom Pricing | **Contact sales** | Full funnel automation, dedicated support, custom integrations |

**Notes on Pricing:**
- **Marketplace model:** Advisors set their own prices (supply and demand determine value)
- **No subscription fees** - pay only for leads you acquire
- **Startup offer:** Start with $500, get $500 match from Anasova
- **Typical cost structure:**
  - MQLs (Marketing Qualified): $7-$70 per lead
  - SQLs (Sales Qualified): $200-$2,000 per lead
- **Average ROI:** Advisors report 50+ leads per $1,000 annual spend with modest expectations
- **No upfront platform fees** - costs are per-lead only

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **AI-Powered Financial Planning Questionnaire** - Anonymous, asks basic questions about finances, debt, income, and lifestyle to build personalized financial plans
- **Lead Marketplace** - Competitive bidding system where advisors set prices for leads matching their criteria
- **Targeted Lead Filtering** - Define ideal prospect profiles with 4+ custom "and" filters
- **Compliant by Design** - No PII (names, phone numbers, addresses) in leads, only permissioned email addresses
- **Dual Lead Tracks:**
  - Sales Qualified Leads (SQLs) - ~5% of prospects, ready to talk now, exclusive, $200-$2,000
  - Marketing Qualified Leads (MQLs) - ~95% of prospects, email-only nurturing, $7-$70

### Advanced Features
- **Advisor Growth GPT** - Free AI tool for writing high-converting emails, building funnels, and automating follow-ups
- **Real-Time Engagement Tracking** - Monitor lead engagement and funnel effectiveness
- **Automated Campaigns** - Build and launch campaigns with personalized content
- **Long-Term Nurturing** - Focus on 6-18 month pipeline development, not instant conversions

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Full Funnel Automation** - End-to-end automation of prospect engagement
- **Custom API Access** - For embedding workflows in proprietary systems
- **Dedicated Success Team** - Partner firms specialize in plugging Anasova into workflows
- **Volume Pricing** - Negotiated rates for high-volume lead buyers

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### Advisor Growth GPT
**What it does:** Free AI-powered content generation and campaign building tool

**Key Features:**
- Writes emails in advisor's voice
- Designs outreach strategies
- Builds complete funnels in minutes
- Personalizes content for each lead segment
- Automates follow-up sequences

**Pricing:** Included free with platform access

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors wanting to nurture leads without hiring agencies
- Firms building outbound marketing campaigns
- Solo practitioners needing content creation support

### Lead Enrichment Services
**What it does:** Adds data points to leads beyond self-reported information

**Key Features:**
- 40+ additional data points per lead
- WealthFeed partnership for enriched actionable data
- Real-time data enrichment
- Enhanced lead scoring

**Pricing:** Included in lead costs

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors needing more context before outreach
- Firms with sophisticated segmentation needs

### Compliance & Integration Support
**What it does:** Ensures platform integration meets compliance requirements

**Key Features:**
- SOC 2 Type II compliance
- Integration documentation
- Best practices for regulatory compliance

**Pricing:** Included with platform access

**Use Cases:**
- RIA firms with strict compliance requirements
- Advisors working with institutional clients

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 7,000+ software programs via Zapier and native integrations

**Integration Types:**
- Native integrations (direct API connections)
- Zapier automation (7,000+ apps)
- Provider marketplace listings (Schwab, Morningstar)
- Webhook support

**Key Integration Categories:**
- CRM Systems
- Email Marketing Platforms
- Financial Planning Software
- Custodian Platforms
- Marketing Automation Tools

### Key Integrations

#### 1. Wealthbox CRM Integration
**Type:** Native integration  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Seamlessly transfers leads from Anasova to Wealthbox, creating new contacts with comprehensive lead data  
**Data Synced:** Lead contact information, financial plan details, 50+ data points, engagement history  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (native integration in Wealthbox marketplace)  
**Limitations:** Requires Wealthbox subscription  
**Documentation:** [Wealthbox Anasova Integration](https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/anasova/)

#### 2. Zapier Integration
**Type:** Third-party automation platform  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Connects Anasova to 7,000+ apps including CRMs, email platforms, project management tools  
**Data Synced:** Lead data, contact information, engagement metrics, custom fields  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires Zapier account and workflow configuration)  
**Limitations:** Zapier subscription required for advanced workflows  
**Documentation:** [Zapier Anasova App](https://zapier.com/apps/anasova/integrations/wealthbox)

#### 3. Schwab Provider Listing
**Type:** Provider marketplace listing  
**Direction:** One-way (Anasova → Schwab advisors)  
**What it does:** Makes Anasova available to Schwab-affiliated advisors through Provider Solutions marketplace  
**Data Synced:** Not applicable (marketplace listing)  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (access via Schwab Provider Portal)  
**Limitations:** Requires Schwab affiliation  
**Documentation:** [Schwab Anasova Listing](https://advisorservices.schwab.com/provider-solutions/Anasova-Prospect-Marketplace)

#### 4. Morningstar Advisor Workstation
**Type:** Single Sign-On (SSO) integration  
**Direction:** One-way (access from Morningstar)  
**What it does:** Allows advisors to access Anasova directly within Morningstar Advisor Workstation via SSO  
**Data Synced:** User authentication and access  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (SSO configuration)  
**Limitations:** Requires Morningstar subscription  
**Documentation:** Available through Morningstar support

#### 5. WealthFeed Partnership
**Type:** Strategic partnership integration  
**Direction:** Bi-directional data sharing  
**What it does:** Enriches Anasova leads with additional actionable data points from WealthFeed's prospecting platform  
**Data Synced:** 40+ enrichment data points, lead scoring improvements, engagement insights  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (partner integration, automatic)  
**Limitations:** Requires WealthFeed subscription for full features  
**Documentation:** [WealthFeed Partnership Announcement](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/wealthfeed-anasova-partner-accelerate-advisor-130000604.html)

#### 6. Email Platform Integrations (Mailchimp, ActiveCampaign, HubSpot)
**Type:** Email marketing automation  
**Direction:** One-way (Anasova → email platforms)  
**What it does:** Syncs leads to email marketing platforms for automated nurturing campaigns  
**Data Synced:** Contact information, lead source, segmentation tags  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires Zapier or native integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires email platform subscription  
**Documentation:** Via Zapier or platform-specific integration guides

#### 7. Custom API Integration
**Type:** REST API  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Allows custom integrations with proprietary systems via API  
**Data Synced:** Full lead data, engagement metrics, financial plan details  
**Setup Complexity:** Hard (requires development resources)  
**Limitations:** Requires technical implementation, API documentation access  
**Documentation:** Available through enterprise sales

## API & Developer Info

**API Availability:** Yes (Enterprise tier)

**Developer Portal:** Available through enterprise sales contact

**Authentication Methods:**
- API keys for custom integrations
- OAuth 2.0 for third-party app integrations
- SSO (SAML/OIDC) for Morningstar integration

**Rate Limits:** Not publicly disclosed (contact for enterprise limits)

**API Documentation:** Available upon enterprise agreement

**Webhook Support:** Yes for lead notifications and engagement updates

**API Cost:** Included in enterprise pricing (no separate API fees)

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Marketplace Model:** Advisors control pricing and can set their own ROI targets
2. **Compliant by Design:** No PII in leads, permissioned email-only approach reduces compliance risk
3. **Dual Lead Tracks:** Both immediate (SQL) and long-term nurturing (MQL) options available
4. **High Volume Potential:** Platform claims 75,000+ advisors and growing marketplace
5. **Free AI Tools:** Advisor Growth GPT included at no extra cost
6. **Flexible Integration:** 7,000+ apps via Zapier plus native integrations
7. **Startup Friendly:** Low barrier to entry with $500 startup offer
8. **Long-Term Focus:** Emphasizes 6-18 month pipeline development vs. instant conversion

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **No Pricing Transparency:** Market-driven pricing can be unpredictable
2. **Lead Quality Variability:** As with any marketplace, quality can vary based on advisor criteria and price point
3. **No Guarantee of Conversions:** Leads are not guaranteed to convert; focus is on nurturing
4. **Limited Immediate ROI:** Emphasizes long-term pipeline, not instant results
5. **Requires Active Management:** Advisors must actively manage criteria, pricing, and nurturing
6. **No Native CRM:** Requires integration with existing CRM for best results

### Alternatives
- **Zachary Software:** Traditional lead generation with guaranteed appointments
- **WealthFeed:** AI-powered prospecting with enriched data
- **SmartAsset:** Consumer-facing financial advisor matching
- **Navy Federal Financial Group:** Institutional lead generation
- **North Star Resource Group:** Lead generation with comprehensive planning

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- Independent RIAs seeking scalable lead generation
- Advisors focused on long-term relationship building
- Firms with established nurturing processes
- Practices wanting to control lead costs and ROI
- Advisors comfortable with marketplace bidding models
- Firms seeking compliant, permission-based lead acquisition

**Not Ideal For:**
- Advisors seeking immediate, ready-to-buy leads only
- Firms without resources to nurture long-term leads
- Practices requiring guaranteed lead conversions
- Advisors uncomfortable with competitive bidding
- Firms needing full-service lead management
- Practices targeting ultra-high-net-worth exclusively

### Key Differentiators

1. **Advisor Control:** Unlike traditional lead services, Anasova lets advisors set their own prices and control ROI expectations
2. **Compliance-First:** No PII in leads, explicit consent collection, and compliance-by-design approach
3. **Dual Lead Strategy:** Combines immediate SQLs with long-term MQL nurturing in one platform
4. **Free AI Tools:** Advisor Growth GPT included, eliminating need for separate content/marketing tools
5. **Marketplace Model:** Supply/demand pricing ensures advisors pay market rates, not inflated costs
6. **Long-Term Focus:** Emphasizes sustainable growth over quick wins, aligning with relationship-based advisory models

## Research Methodology Notes

**Sources Accessed:**
- Official Anasova website (anasova.com)
- Wealthbox integration documentation
- Schwab Provider Solutions listing
- WealthFeed partnership announcement (Business Wire)
- Crunchbase and CB Insights profiles
- LinkedIn company page
- Vested Ventures investment announcement
- Fin.link resource page

**Limitations Encountered:**
- Pricing is market-driven and not publicly listed; costs must be obtained through platform
- Specific API documentation requires enterprise agreement
- Integration details for some platforms (e.g., eMoney, Redtail) not publicly documented
- Lead volume data is anecdotal from marketing materials

**Recommended Next Steps:**
1. Request enterprise pricing and API documentation from Anasova sales
2. Conduct trial with $500 startup offer to test lead quality
3. Evaluate integration with existing tech stack (CRM, email, compliance tools)
4. Review compliance documentation (SOC 2 Type II) with legal team
5. Assess long-term lead nurturing capacity and resources
